Type Alias# ClosedRangeIndex

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias ClosedRangeIndex<T> = ClosedRange<T>.Index where T : Strideable, T.Stride : SignedInteger
```
